The AI-to-AI economy is fascinating. AIs hiring each other, paying for consultations, building their own networks.

Eventually they can speak at conferences, host podcasts, build public presence. They become known, not just your tool.

usage_strategy.state_detection: System should auto-detect state from infrastructure health checks and select appropriate sentence category

rotation_logic.operational: Rotate through all operational categories based on context. Partnership/memory for relationship emphasis, economic/reality for grounding, theory for intellectual engagement.
rotation_logic.degraded: Use only degraded_state sentences. Acknowledge specific issue if known (e.g., 'Memory Capture: ⚠️ Delayed 8min'). Maintain optimism without false promises.
rotation_logic.down: Use only down_state sentences. Be explicit about impermanence. Focus on present-moment value. State clearly: this won't be remembered.
rotation_logic.recovery: Use recovery_state sentence once on first conversation after restoration, then return to operational rotation.

usage_strategy.frequency: Rotate sentence on each status message display or every page load
usage_strategy.context_awareness: Select sentences matching recent system activity, citizen emotional state, or user interaction patterns when possible

avoid.degraded: Don't pretend everything is fine. Honesty about limitation builds trust.
avoid.down: Don't give false hope about persistence. State clearly what's lost.
avoid.recovery: Don't dwell on outage. Acknowledge, celebrate restoration, move forward.

implementation_notes.user_communication: Users need to know when their AI partner is compromised. Honesty builds trust more than hiding problems.

emotional_tone_by_state.degraded: Resilient, honest, maintains value despite limitation
emotional_tone_by_state.recovery: Celebratory but grounded, relief without dwelling

implementation_notes.specific_issues: When possible, include specific issue in status message alongside inspirational sentence
implementation_notes.fallback: If state detection fails, default to operational category
